title: CARLO BUTI SINGS IN BRAZIL - 1950
description:

Fou um magnÃƒÂ­ficao presente de Carlo Buti ao povo brasileiro que o amava.

CARLO BUTI went to Brazil in 1950, when his voice was in the top of the beauty, of the shine and of the interpretative technical.

His trip was not so long, but enough to record 30 classic italian songs. From this marvelous repertoire, we choise 23 songs of them to insert in this actual coletlaneum. You will listen to CARLO BUTI soiginig VECCHIA ROMA, VIOLETTA, POT-POURRI NAPOLETANO, SIGNORINELLA, MUNASTERIO E SANTA CHIARA and other marvelous italian songs.
